verses.verse: Out of the depths<WH4615> have I cried<WH7121> unto you<WH3068>, O Lord.
Lord<WH136>, hear<WH8085> my voice<WH6963>: let your ears<WH241> be attentive<WH7183> to the voice<WH6963> of my supplications<WH8469>.
If you<WH3050>, Lord, should mark<WH8104> iniquities<WH5771>, O Lord<WH136>, who shall stand<WH5975>?
But there is forgiveness<WH5547> with you<WH3372>, that you may be feared.
I wait<WH6960> for the Lord<WH3068>, my soul<WH5315> does wait<WH6960>, and in his word<WH1697> do I hope<WH3176>.
My soul<WH5315> waits for the Lord<WH136> more than they that watch<WH8104> for the morning<WH1242>: I say<WH8104>, more than they that watch for the morning<WH1242>.
Let Israel<WH3478> hope<WH3176> in the Lord<WH3068>: for with the Lord<WH3068> there is mercy<WH2617>, and with him is plentiful<WH7235> redemption<WH6304>.
And he shall redeem<WH6299> Israel<WH3478> from all his iniquities<WH5771>.
